class_notes: This is an online sychronous course. Pre-requisites: EPI 530 or 504 AND BIOS 500 or instructor permission.
course_description: Prerequisites/concurrent: EPI 504 or EPI 530 and BIOS 500.  This course will provide training in the investigation, control, and prevention of hospital acquired infectious diseases and other hospital events by the use of appropriate epidemiologic techniques, both descriptive and analytic.
sections: Class Nbr: 4653, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 1-2:50p, Instructor: Fridkin/Cahill, Status: Open
